channel.title: Projects on gaspa
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on gaspa

item.title: Galápagos: Automated N-Version Programming with LLMs
item.description: Galápagos is a tool that automates the generation of N-Version program variants using LLMs and validates their equivalence, demonstrating effectiveness in creating diverse and reliable variants, even across different programming languages.

item.title: Knowledge Graph construction with Language Models
item.description: Collaborating alongside a group of colleagues with SEB, a leading Nordic bank, on a joint project for my Project Course in Data Science at KTH.

item.title: ResumosLEIC
item.description: A platform compiling class notes and useful tools for the Computer Science and Engineering Bachelor's degree at Instituto Superior Técnico.
